name: 2015 International Conference on Mechanical Engineering and Automation Science
content: Keynote Speakers Prof. Olivier BAUCHAU, Hong Kong University of Science and Technology Prof. Dennis Y.C. Leung, the University of Hong Kong, Hong Kong Prof. Kyle Jiang, University of Birmingham, UK Prof. Harijono Djojodihardjo, Universiti Putra Malaysia, Malaysia Prof. Yong Zhao from Alfaisal University, Saudi Arabia Submission Deadline: Aug.30, 2015 Submission Method: Authors can submit the full manuscript through electronic submission system through: http://www.easychair.org/conferences/?conf=icmeas2015\. If you have any question, please feel free to contact our conference secretary. Ms. Jennifer Law Tel:+852-30697937 Welcome you to contact us by Email to info@icmeas.org. Topics of interest for submission include, but are not limited to:  Aerodynamics  Aerospace Systems and Technology  Alternative energy  Applied Mechanics and Design  Automation Engineering  Machine Design  Machinery Dynamics  Manufacturing  Mechanical Engineering More details can be found at: http://www.icmeas.org/cfp.php
